title: Tom Cavanagh 💙💛⚾️😬
description:
Tom Cavanagh (The Flash) reflects on the overwhelmingly positive experience he had working with Justin on the TV show Ed, he discusses the time he spent living in Africa with his family, and he talks about why it can be fun to play the villain instead of the cool guy.
